thread.title: Just playing with the atmosphere editor

post.author: Tron
post.body:

Here are some random changes I made testing things out. Wouldn't normally post small stuff like this but hopefully it will prompt other people to show what they have been doing.

These screenshots are all straight from ingame with no changes at all except for resizing.
